a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Energy use per capita vs. CO₂ emissions per capita, 2015

Average energy consumption per capita is measured in
kilowatt-hours
per person.
Average carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions per capita are measured in tonnes per person.
Data source: EDGAR Community GHG Database (European Commission JRC, IEA), via World Bank (2025); IEA and OECD, via World
